title: A history of the universe in sound
description: Artist-technologist Honor Harger listens to the weird and wonderful noises of stars and planets and pulsars. In her work, she tracks the radio waves emitted by ancient celestial objects and turns them into sound, including "the oldest song you will ever hear," the sound of cosmic rays left over from the Big Bang.
author: Honor Harger
keywords: TED, talks, art, astronomy, design, entertainment, physics, sound, technology
